src:
Marcus Rashford: MU Sangat Merindukan Anthony Martial
06 Nov 2019, 20:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Penyerang Manchester United, Marcus Rashford merasa senang melihat Anthony Martial kembali merumput. Rashford menyebut bahwa penyerang asal Prancis itu memberikan tambahan opsi di lini serang United saat ini.
Martial sempat hampir dua bulan absen di skuat Manchester United. Ia mengalami cedera saat pertandingan melawan Crystal Palace sehingga Rashford harus bekerja sendirian di lini serang United.
Dua minggu terkahir, Rashford sudah pulih dari cederanya. Ia bahkan sudah mengemas dua gol dari empat pertandingan terakhir yang ia mainkan bersama Setan Merah.
Rashford mengaku kehadiran Martial benar-benar membantunya di lini serang United. "Jika anda mendapatkan bantuan ketika anda bermain sebagai penyerang tengah, maka situasinya tidak terlalu buruk," beber Rashford kepada Sky Sports.

Baca komentar lengkap sang penyerang di bawah ini.
text:
Marcus Rashford: MU really missed Anthony Martial
Nov 6 2019, 20:20 by Bola.net
Soccer - Manchester United striker Marcus Rashford was delighted to see Anthony Martial graze again. Rashford said that the French striker gave additional options in United's attacking line at the moment.
Martial was almost two months out in the Manchester United squad. He suffered an injury during the match against Crystal Palace so Rashford had to work alone in United's attack line.
In the past two weeks, Rashford has recovered from his injury. He has even packed two goals in the last four games that he played with the Red Devils.
Rashford claimed Martial's presence really helped him in United's attacking line. "If you get help when you play as a center forward, then the situation isn't too bad," Rashford told Sky Sports.

Read the attacker's full comments below.
